landing.title: Fluxo. Clarity to close the month.
landing.subtitle: Fluxo.sh organizes spending, income, bills, and installments in the right month. Quick mobile logging, your data stays yours.
landing.pricingSubtitle: Use everything on Free and move up only when limits matter. At launch, the Founder Pack locks in the best deal.
landing.pricingFootnote: Monthly or yearly billing. Limits follow the active plan. Founder Pack valid only during the initial beta.
landing.pricingFounderDesc: Limited to the initial Fluxo beta
landing.pricingFounderPriceNote: 1 year on Saver ¬∑ half price + lifetime 50% off
landing.heroBadge: Real privacy: no selling, no AI training
landing.featureTitle: Everything to close the month without surprises
landing.featureSubtitle: Installments, bills, and budgets in the right place. Privacy by default and your data stays yours.
landing.featureOneText: Bought in 12x? Each installment lands in the right month.
landing.featureTwoText: Track closing dates, due dates, and payments per card.
landing.featureThreeText: Set category goals and see what is left before month end.
landing.featureFourText: Import and export whenever you want and delete your account in the app. Your data is not sold or used to train AI.
landing.howSubtitle: A simple flow, built for daily use on mobile.
landing.howStepOneText: Upload CSV/OFX and add quick entries day to day, right from your phone.
landing.howStepTwoText: Automatic suggestions based on your history to save time.
landing.howStepThreeText: See real balance with installments and bills included.
landing.proofSubtitle: For people who want clarity without turning into accountants.
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join the waitlist. No spam and no data selling.
landing.footerText: Personal finance tracking with installments, bills, and budgets in the right place.
landing.faq1A: Yes. We will launch with a single, simple plan.
landing.faq2Q: How do you handle my data?
landing.faq2A: We don't sell data, we don't use it to train AI, and you can export or delete in the app anytime.
landing.faq3A: Use it in the browser with app-like experience (PWA).
landing.waitlistSuccess: Done! You're on the list. We'll notify you when we grant access.
landing.waitlistErrorDuplicate: This email is already on the waitlist.
landing.waitlistErrorRateLimit: Too many attempts. Please wait a moment.
landing.waitlistErrorGeneric: Something went wrong. Please try again.

welcome.title: Welcome to Fluxo!
welcome.description: In a few steps, we will get your accounts and budgets ready so you can close the month with clarity.

features.title: What Fluxo does for you:
features.budgets: Set budgets and see what is left for the month
features.invoices: Track bills, closing dates, and due dates
features.insights: See your real month balance (no spreadsheets)

legal.sectionDescription: Transparency on data and service rules.
legal.agreementPrefix: By continuing, you agree to the

privacy.summaryBullet1: Your data is yours. We do not sell or share it with advertisers.
privacy.summaryBullet2: We do not use your data for AI training.
privacy.summaryBullet3: You can export or delete your account at any time.
privacy.summaryBullet4: We use essential vendors under contract to run the service.
privacy.dataIntro: We collect only what is needed to operate the service:
privacy.dataBullet1: Account data: name, email, hashed password.
privacy.dataBullet2: Financial data you add or import: accounts, transactions, categories, budgets.
privacy.dataBullet3: Preferences and settings: language, timezone, notifications.
privacy.dataBullet4: Basic technical data for security and operation: IP, browser, logs.
privacy.dataBullet5: Usage events and metrics to improve the product.
privacy.useBullet1: Run the app and keep your history.
privacy.useBullet2: Calculate bills, installments, budgets, and alerts.
privacy.useBullet6: Improve the product with aggregated analytics.
privacy.sharingBody: We do not sell or share your data with third parties for advertising or AI training. We only share it with processors that act on our behalf.
privacy.aiBody: We never use your data to train AI models and require the same from our vendors.
privacy.ownershipBody: You own your data. You can import and export anytime and delete your account in-app.
privacy.retentionBody: We keep data while your account exists. When you delete your account, we remove product data. Backups may retain information for a limited time. Billing data may be retained by Stripe for legal obligations.
privacy.securityBody: We use HTTPS, access controls, per-user segregation, and monitoring. No system is 100% secure.
privacy.rightsBody: You can access, correct, export, and delete your data, and revoke consent when applicable. Contact us to exercise rights under LGPD.
privacy.updatesBody: If this policy changes, we will update this page and the date above.

terms.intro: By using Fluxo.sh, you agree to these Terms of Service.
terms.serviceBody: Fluxo.sh provides personal finance tracking tools. We are not a bank, broker, or financial advisor; nothing here is financial advice.
terms.accountBullet2: You are responsible for activity on your account.
terms.acceptableUseBullet1: Do not use the service for illegal activities.
terms.acceptableUseBullet2: Do not attempt to access third-party systems or data.
terms.acceptableUseBullet3: Do not reverse engineer or bypass limits.
terms.acceptableUseBullet4: Do not abuse the service, APIs, or automations.
terms.dataBody: You keep ownership of your data. You grant us a limited license to host and process it solely to operate the service. You can export and delete at any time, per the Privacy Policy.
terms.billingBody: Paid plans are billed through Stripe with automatic renewal based on your plan. You can manage or cancel in billing. Taxes may apply. Cancellations do not include automatic refunds.
terms.availabilityBody: We may adjust features and perform maintenance. We aim for high availability but do not guarantee uninterrupted access.
terms.disclaimerBody: The service is provided "as is". We do not guarantee that data is complete or error-free.
terms.liabilityBody: To the maximum extent permitted, our liability is limited to the amount you paid in the last 12 months.
terms.terminationBody: You can close your account at any time. We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms. After termination, we handle your data per the Privacy Policy.
terms.lawBody: These terms are governed by the laws of Brazil. Venue: Sao Paulo/SP.
